name: FUNK BOT
text:
ITS FUNKY BUNKY IM A - - 

FUNK. BOT. 

HERE TO FUNK.

FUNK BOT HERE TO FUNK.

NOW THE BOTS GOT MOVES
AND ITS GOT SHADES
BUT THERE'S ONE THING YOU MIGHT MISS

IS THAT HE'S GOT HIMSELF
A SCRAGGLEY BEARD
AND ITLL SCRATCH IF YOU GIVE HIM A KISS

BUT THIS BOTS GOTTA GROVE
AND HE'S GOTTA DANCE
SO YOU'LL SEE HIM OUT ON THE FLOOR

DOIN THE DAMN ROBOT
TIL HIS CLOTHES FALL OFF
AND WOMEN DRAGGIN HIM OUTTA THE DOOR

NOW YOU MIGHT JUST THINK 
THIS BOY TOO FLY
AND THAT HE'S NOT ALLOWED ONTO THE CHAIN

BUT IM BIG FUNKY BUNKY
HECK SOMNUS EVEN LOVE ME
I DONT FOLLOW ANY RULES TO THE GAME

NOW IF YOU'RE TRAVELING OUT
DOWN TO MEGA CITY
CALL YA BROTHER IF YA WANTIN TO BALL

WE GONNA GET A COUPLE BOTS
FULL OF FANTASY THOUGHTS
AND PARTY PARTY UNTIL THE LAST CALL
